notes: Special issue (v. 1, no. 3) of the magazine To Life, about Jewish comics professionals.

Comics contents: "Holy comics, Batman! It's Bob Kane!" ; "It's a Bird, it's a Plane, it's Siegel and Shuster" ; "The Mad World of Harvey Kurtzman" ; "The Spirit of Will Eisner" ; "Art Spiegelman: the Adult Comic Soul" ; "Building Superheros the Stan Lee Way" ; "Jack Kirby, the 'Marvel' Behind Marvel Comics."
